sporty.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who is sporty likes sport and is good at it
sporty.translation[0].definitions[1].def: sporty clothes are designed to look attractive in a bright informal way
sporty.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a sporty car is designed to look attractive and go fast
sporty.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The new model is slightly more sporty.
